mapper.select: select e.employeeseq as "eemployeeseq", e.name as "ename", e.email as "eemail", p.position as "eposition", e.phone as "ephone", e.levelseq as "elevelseq" from tblemployee e left outer join tblPosition p on p.positionseq = e.positionseq
select positionseq as pseq, position from tblposition
mapper.insert: insert into tblEmployee(employeeseq, name, email, pw, phone, positionseq, levelseq) values (employeeseq.nextVal, #{name}, #{email}||'@sysoft.com', #{pw}, #{phone}, #{positionseq}, #{levelseq})
mapper.select: select e.employeeseq as "employeeseq", e.name as "name", e.email as "email", e.positionseq as "positionseq", p.position as "position", e.phone as "phone", e.levelseq as "levelseq" from tblemployee e left outer join tblPosition p on p.positionseq = e.positionseq where employeeseq = #{employeeseq}
mapper.update: update tblemployee set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, pw = #{pw}, phone = #{phone}, positionseq = #{positionseq}, levelseq = #{levelseq} where employeeseq = #{employeeseq}
mapper.select: select count(email) as cnt from (select substr(email, 1, instr(email, '@', 1)-1) as email from tblemployee) where email = #{email}

select p.projectseq as "projectseq", p.pcode as "projectcode", p.name as "projectname", pt.type as "projecttype", p.startdate as "projectstart", p.finishdate as "projectfinish" from tblproject p inner join tblptype pt on p.ptypeseq = pt.ptypeseq

select e.employeeseq as "employeeseq", e.name as "name", p.position as "positionname" from tblemployee e inner join tblposition p on e.positionseq = p.positionseq where p.position in ('상무', '이사', '부장', '차장', '과장', '계장') order by p.position
select rndseq as "rndseq", state as "rndstate" from tblrnd
select ptypeseq as "ptypeseq", type as "ptype" from tblptype
select distinct(name) as teamname from tblteam where projectseq is null
select pstateseq, state as pstate from tblpstate
mapper.insert: insert into tblProject (projectseq, pcode, name, startdate, finishdate, pstateseq, ptypeseq, rndseq) values (projectseq.nextVal, (select 'sysyst-'||substr(sysdate, 1, 2)||'-'||substr(sysdate, 4, 2) as pcode from dual), #{name}, #{startdate}, #{finishdate}, '1', #{ptypeseq}, #{rndseq})
update tblteam set projectseq = (select max(projectseq) from tblproject) where name = #{team}
insert into tblTeam (teamseq, projectseq, employeeseq, roleseq, name) values (teamseq.nextVal, null, #{pl}, 1, #{team})
mapper.select: select count(name) as cnt from (select distinct name as name from tblteam) where name = #{team}

select p.projectseq, p.name as projectname, p.startdate as startdate, p.finishdate as finishdate, ps.state as state, vt.name as teamname from tblproject p left outer join vadminproject vt on p.projectseq = vt.projectseq inner join tblpstate ps on ps.pstateseq = p.pstateseq where p.projectseq = #{projectseq}
mapper.update: update tblteam set projectseq = #{projectseq} where name = #{teamname}
update tblproject set name = #{name}, startdate = #{startdate}, finishdate = #{finishdate}, pstateseq = #{pstateseq}, ptypeseq = #{ptypeseq}, rndseq = #{rndseq} where projectseq = #{projectseq}
update tblteam set projectseq = null where projectseq = #{projectseq}
